text: Very friendly bartender, Danyelle is great company. I always come here while in Vegas & haven't had any regrets. CHEERS!!!
A dump of the highest level. It gives dive bar a step up. The bathroom is so dirty it makes me feel like I need shots after being there.

We had such an amazing time. Local bar with fun locals nice staff and a good karaoke DJ! Went for 1 drink and ended up staying 6 hours and made the best memories!  Bucks was the talk of my entire day! Remember your only a stranger once!
